content.question: Write an essay that argues your position on the degree to which grit determines one’s ability to achieve. In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents a defensible position. Provide evidence to support your line of reasoning. Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

frqParts.text: Write an essay that argues your position on the degree to which grit determines one’s ability to achieve. In your response you should do the following: Respond to the prompt with a thesis that presents a defensible position. Provide evidence to support your line of reasoning. Explain how the evidence supports your line of reasoning. Use appropriate grammar and punctuation in communicating your argument.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Develop paragraphs comprised of a claim and evidence that supports the claim.
